frog.info: While frogs does include the subset known as toads but are primarily characterized by their aquatic nature and moist, smooth skin

toad.info: Toads are a subset of frogs which are characterized by dry, leathery skin, short legs, and large bumps covering glands.

salamander.info: Salamanders are characterized by their lizard-like appearance, slender bodies, blunt snouts, short limbs, and smooth and moist skin
